sentences.english: Many schools around the country have adopted similar coursework.
sentences.chinese: 全国许多学校创立了相似的课程。

sentences.english: During the first half of this year, the country added a total of 26 million new Internet users.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的上半年，全国的网民增加了两千六百万。

sentences.english: Make your records available to the local and national record committees.
sentences.chinese: 将自己的纪录提供给地区或是全国性的纪录委员会。

sentences.english: How should we evaluate China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 对全国教育战线十七年的工作怎样估计？

sentences.english: His fame spread throughout the country.
The wedding expenses in Shanghai are among the highest in the country.
sentences.chinese: 上海的婚嫁消费成本在全国居首位。

sentences.english: Professional building in the country with a demonstration effect.
sentences.chinese: 专业的建设在全国带有一定的示范作用。

sentences.english: Shanghai provides direst flights to more than 60 cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 上海的国际航班可直达全国上60多座都会。

sentences.english: John's about to start a nine-week national speaking tour.
sentences.chinese: 约翰即将展开一场历时九周的全国巡回演讲。

sentences.english: Products to local market and exported to international markets.
sentences.chinese: 产品行销全国各地，并出口国际市场。

sentences.english: National-wide, females claim 38% of the total number of cadres.
sentences.chinese: 全国女干部的比例已占干部总数的38%以上。

sentences.english: Appears in the newspapers, the national only environment deodorizes the laboratory to settle down Jinmen.
sentences.chinese: 报载，全国唯一的环境“除臭”实验室落户津门。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: They are already poaching our staff from our branches across the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在已经在全国范围内挖角我们的人才。

sentences.english: Our club has affiliated with a national society.
sentences.chinese: 我们俱乐部已与一个全国性协会合并。

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 河西走廊被誉为甘肃的粮仓和全国的商品粮基地之一。

definition: Hebei Province (Hopeh) in north China surrounding Beijing, short name 冀[Ji4], capital Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1]
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫[Yu4], capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
Jiangsu Province (Kiangsu) in southeast China, abbr. 蘇|苏[Su1], capital Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]
Zhejiang Province (Chekiang) in east China, abbr. 浙[Zhe4], capital Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2 zhou1]
Beijing/capital of People's Republic of China/one of the four municipalities 直轄市|直辖市[zhi2 xia2 shi4]
in all parts of (a country)/various regions
domestic and international/at home and abroad
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Shandong, province in northeast China, short name 魯|鲁[Lu3], capital Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2]
